dynamic_line: Hey there, stranger! I'm Nautilus, leader of this little caravan we have here. We've got quite a few supplies to deliver, and it looks like you could use some help. Why don't you join us?

responses.text: What's it going to cost me?

dynamic_line: Have some more questions? Ask away, and I'll do my best to shed some light.

responses.text: What's it going to cost me?

dynamic_line:
Welp, joining the caravan isn't exactly cheap, but I promise it'll be worth every single coin. We've got a lot of mouths to feed and supplies to buy, so we need people who are willing to chip in and help us out.

But don't worry, I won't ask for everything you have right away.

dynamic_line.gendered_line: I was just a regular person. Until some American <name_b>s ruined my business!
